content: 2 row 1 chain 1 then single_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch in the chain 1 when you come back around 78 stitches row 2 sdc and 2 double_crochet in the same st *skip 2 st 3 double_crochet in next stitch* repeat * * around slip_stitch in the sdc at the beginning of the round 78 stitches row 3-19 repeat row 2 for each round row 20 chain 1 single_crochet all the way around slip_stitch into the chain 1 row 21 after the slip_stitch into the chain 1 *chain 3 slip_stitch into that stitch and slip_stitch into the next 2 st* repeat * * around your last slip_stitch will be one st before your first chain 3 bump bottom edging on the bottom chain edge join yarn and *chain 3 slip_stitch into that stitch and slip_stitch into the next 2 st* repeat * * around your last slip_stitch will be one st before your first chain 3 bump break yarn and sew in all loose ends sew in loose ends with darning needle pattern and photos are copyright © cj brady/omega ranch 2016
